function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Divisions in Europe exacerbating due to pandemic response differences","Impact":"Further division within Europe, jeopardizing unity and cooperation","Mitigation":"Promote mutual co-financing of public expenditures, address economic disparities","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Countries and citizens of Europe","Owner":"European leaders, policymakers, and international organizations"},{"Description":"Opposition to mutual co-financing of public expenditures","Impact":"Worsening economic, social, and political rift in Europe","Mitigation":"Advocate for mutual co-financing, address external surpluses and deficits","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Countries with strong external surpluses, countries with deficits","Owner":"European leaders, policymakers, and international organizations"},{"Description":"Localised manufacturing impacting capacity for medical products","Impact":"Lack of adequate capacity in crucial sectors for medical products","Mitigation":"Promote domestic industrial capacity, invest in local manufacturing","Technologies":"Advanced manufacturing technologies, automation","People":"Countries with deindustrialization, healthcare providers","Owner":"Governments, industrial leaders, and healthcare organizations"}]}
